Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

Class PagesResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.platform.cache.service.impl.CacheServiceImpl<ResourceManager.Template>
      • com.composum.pages.commons.service.PagesResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceManager, com.composum.platform.cache.service.CacheService<ResourceManager.Template>
    public class PagesResourceManager
extends com.composum.platform.cache.service.impl.CacheServiceImpl<ResourceManager.Template>
implements ResourceManager
    the ResourceManager implementation of Pages handles templates and design rules of content resources and provides some resource management operations such as create from template, copy, move, ... in the Pages context (with reference transformation and property filtering)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected class  PagesResourceManager.CacheConfig  
      static interface  PagesResourceManager.Config
      the configuration for the template cache
      class  PagesResourceManager.DesignImpl
      the reference to a design rule of a content element; this is referencing the child resource of the structure matching 'cpp:design' subnode of a template appropriate for a content element; such a design is used to get design properties of an element, especially the content structure pattern sets ('allowedContainers', 'allowedElements', ...)
      protected class  PagesResourceManager.ReferenceImpl
      the reference to a potentially non existing (static included; can exist but mustn't) content resource this is a simple transferable (JSON) resource description without the overhead of a NonExistingResource and with access to the resources properties (if resource exists), the design and the resource type properties even if the resource ist not existing (to check rules during creation, moving and copying)
      class  PagesResourceManager.ReferenceListImpl
      a list of references (simple transferable as a JSON array) for the Pages editing UI
      static class  PagesResourceManager.TemplateCopyFilter
      the node filter to prevent from copying template rules and meta data to content targets
      protected class  PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl
      a template is used to create new resources (pages) wth predefined content (structure); the template contains also content hierarchy rules for pages and component design rules for containers and elements; a page created from a template is referencing this template and using the rules in content operations, the rules are not copied to resources during creation from a template a reference property is set instead of copying the rules; templates are cached to improve the performance of rule calculations

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.composum.pages.commons.service.ResourceManager

        ResourceManager.Design, ResourceManager.NopTemplateContext, ResourceManager.ReferenceList, ResourceManager.ResourceReference, ResourceManager.Template, ResourceManager.TemplateContext

      • moveContentResource

        @Nonnull
public org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource moveContentResource​(@Nonnull
                                                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                                  @Nonnull
                                                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource changeRoot,
                                                                  @Nonnull
                                                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource source,
                                                                  @Nonnull
                                                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource targetParent,
                                                                  @Nullable
                                                                  String newName,
                                                                  @Nullable
                                                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource before,
                                                                  @Nonnull
                                                                  List<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> updatedReferrers)
                                                           throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                                                  org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Moves a resource and adopts all references to the moved resource or one of its children.
        Specified by:
        moveContentResource in interface ResourceManager
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver (session context)
        changeRoot - the root element for reference search and change
        source - the resource to move
        targetParent - the target (the parent resource) of the move
        newName - an optional new name for the resource
        before - the designated sibling in an ordered target collection
        updatedReferrers - output parameter: the List of referers found - these were changed and might need setting a last modification date
        Returns:
        the new resource at the target path
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException

      • changeReferences

        public void changeReferences​(@Nonnull
                             com.composum.sling.core.filter.ResourceFilter resourceFilter,
                             @Nonnull
                             com.composum.sling.core.filter.StringFilter propertyFilter,
                             @Nonnull
                             org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                             @Nonnull
                             List<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> foundReferrers,
                             boolean scanOnly,
                             @Nonnull
                             String oldPath,
                             @Nonnull
                             String newPath)
                      throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Changes the 'oldPath' references in each property of a tree to the 'newPath'. Caution: this does *not* update the last modification date of referrers - that has to be done later from {foundReferrers}.
        Specified by:
        changeReferences in interface ResourceManager
        Parameters:
        resourceFilter - change all resources accepted by this filter, let all other resources unchanged
        propertyFilter - change only the properties with names matching to this property name filter
        resource - the resource to change (recursive! - the root in the initial call)
        foundReferrers - the List of referers found (to fill during traversal, empty in the initial call)
        scanOnly - if 'true' no changes are made but the referer list is filled
        oldPath - the old path of a moved resource
        newPath - the new path of the resource
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException

      • changeReferences

        protected String changeReferences​(String value,
                                  String oldPath,
                                  String newPath)
        Changes all references to 'oldPath' and use the 'newPath' in simple values or rich text strings.
        Parameters:
        value - the string value (probably rich text)
        oldPath - the old path of the references to change
        newPath - the new path value
        Returns:
        the changed value if changed otherwise 'null'

      • createFromTemplate

        public org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource createFromTemplate​(@Nonnull
                                                                 ResourceManager.TemplateContext context,
                                                                 @Nonnull
                                                                 org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource parent,
                                                                 @Nonnull
                                                                 String name,
                                                                 @Nonnull
                                                                 org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource template,
                                                                 boolean setTemplateProperty)
                                                          throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                                                 org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Creates a new resource as a copy of a template. If content nodes of such a template are referencing other templates by a 'template' property the content of these referenced templates is copied (used in site templates to reference the normal page templates of the site inside of a site template).
        Specified by:
        createFromTemplate in interface ResourceManager
        Parameters:
        context - the resolver to use for CRUD operations
        parent - the parent resource for the new resource
        name - the name of the new resource
        template - the template content resource
        setTemplateProperty - if 'true' the 'template' property is filled with the template path
        Returns:
        the resource created
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException - if an error is occurring
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException

      • applyContent

        protected void applyContent​(@Nonnull
                            ResourceManager.TemplateContext context,
                            @Nonnull

                     throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Applies the content resource data from a template content resource to a target content resource.
        Parameters:
        context - the resolver to use for CRUD operations
        template - the template content resource
        target - the target content resource
        merge - if 'true' the target properties will be unmodified and all new aspects from the template will be added
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException - if an error is occurring
